name: Darktopia
description:
Darktopia

Come in Darktopia, a futuristic Dark punk city where robots live after humanity died in an apocalypse.

This project is waiting for subventions. The actuals .exe are fast prototypes i made to clarify my ideas.

There are 2 .exe: 

  • Darktopia_Fight : First try, it's a simple fight with a "Boss" with a first visual test
  • Darktopia_Prototype : 2nd try, you can explore a small part of Darktopia and fight a Boss

Here some input for Darktopia_Prototype (you need a controler):

  • Left Stick to move
  • A, X to jump
  • B to go down from a plateform
  • In fight, B to attack
  • In fight, A to dash

The prototype end after the Boss's lifebar reach 0.

I used Penubsmic's Dark Character demo pack for the character and Szadi art's Dark Plateformer set 01 for the environment.

Share  your opinion about my game!

-> Download the .rar, extract the files,  execute the .exe from the PC file on your computer.

More of my games here: https://smevisulien.wixsite.com/mygames
